name: Audaz
descriptions: Audaz is a pet dog living in the Gibson scrap yard in 2281.
Audaz is owned by Old Lady Gibson, owner of the Gibson scrap yard.
All of Old Lady Gibson's dogs are named using Spanish words, with Audaz translating to “bold.”

Xbox 360 Sometimes after going through the back door at HELIOS One, Audaz, Basura, Colmillo, and three mole rats will attack you. There seem to be two ways to fix this. Try reloading the autosave. If that does not work, kill the mole rats, avoiding the dogs. Go inside and wait until you are
